column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If I were a pizza
column2: I'd be a Lou Malnati's Classic -- meaty
column4: and goes well with beer.  I love the fact that they get the proportions just right
column6: goopy tomato sauce is balanced by sausage and cheesy goodness.  Since this location is near the Mag Mile
column7: be prepared for some serious wait times unless you go early or late.
